segments.text: Hello . Mr . Othman ? This is Michael in Mr . Emory ’ s office . He ’ d like to set up and appointment with you to talk about buying a new copier .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , I ’ d be glad to . What time frame did he have in mind ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He ’ d like to do it as soon as possible , sir . How about tomorrow at 2:45 ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mm , yeah , that ’ ll be great . Tell him I ’ ll see him then .
segments.speaker: S2
